features: MAKEUP FOR COLOR-CORRECTING: Master the color-correcting techniques you’ve seen all over your social feed and camouflage discoloration with these lightweight color correctors.

CAMOUFLAGE REDNESS, DISCOLORATION & MORE: Available in 5 shades, each complimentary color helps to cover dullness, red tones, blemishes, dark spots, under eye circles, and other discoloration for a range of skin tones.
WEAR UNDER FOUNDATION & CONCEALER: The long-lasting, lightweight formula layers flawlessly under foundations and concealers without caking or creasing.
FULL-COVERAGE FINISH: This hydrating and lightweight color correction makeup has a full-coverage, satin finish.
INFUSED WITH HYALURONIC ACID: Infused with hyaluronic acid and rose flower water for ultimate hydration.
body.description: What is it: A hydrating, lightweight, and long-lasting color corrector in 5 shades to camouflage discoloration, dullness and redness. Why we love: Hydrating and lightweight color correction makeup that layers well underneath foundations and concealers Available in a wide range of shades for all color-correcting needs and skin tones Long-lasting and crease-resistant Full coverage with a satin finish Infused with hyaluronic acid Key Ingredients: Hyaluronic Acid Rose Flower Water Master the color-correcting techniques you’ve seen all over your social feed and camouflage discoloration with these lightweight color correctors. Available in 5 shades, each complimentary color helps to cover dullness, red tones, blemishes, dark spots, under eye circles, and other discoloration for a range of skin tones. The long-lasting, lightweight formula layers flawlessly under foundations and concealers without caking or creasing and has a full-coverage, satin finish. All e.l.f. products are free from phthalates, parabens, nonylphenol ethoxylates, triclosan and triclocarban. Proud to be 100% vegan, cruelty-free, and Leaping Bunny Certified. Because kindness is chic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for dark circles
reviews.reviewText: I love this orange concealer! I use it everyday as I tend to have baggy dark circles under my eyes. Just a few dots and blend it in and then put your foundation over the top of it and it really works wonders. I completely recommend. The price is great I go through maybe a bottle of month.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Corrector for Light to Medium Tan Skintones
reviews.reviewText: This is a great corrector for under eyes. It's so easy to spread and hydrating. Absolutely great, and the price is so great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan. Didn't blend and correct my dark eyes
reviews.reviewText: Not a fan. Didn't blend and correct my dark eyes or age spots like it was supposed to. Was way to dark. Went on fairly smoothly but became a little heavy. Sorry I am not a fan but could be someone else's favorite product, just not mine.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Decent product - odd color
reviews.reviewText: I have used the yellow elf corrector and it works well to brighten, but this color is odd. Most color-correctors are more peach-toned, which combats blue/purple. But this one is darker and a little muddy. The consistency is nice and it spreads well. I would not buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 23, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars OMG this stuff works like magic!!!
reviews.reviewText: I really wasn't expecting much from this product given that it is so cheap. But WOW I am so impressed. I put it on before my foundation this morning and it worked beautifully. I could hardly believe my eyes. The dark areas under my eyes just disappeared and made me look at least 10 years younger. The product left my skin looking very natural. THANK YOU!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I don’t know how I ever lived without these. Got the peach and the green(got orange to try in summer when I’m tanned). It blends well, doesn’t cake up and after my makeup application it looks flawless.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was a bit skeptical, but totally pleased.
reviews.reviewText: I'm new to the whole issue of color correctors. I used to just pile on the concealer and pray for the best. I decided to try this from a commercial, and I am glad that I didFirst, as a brown skin girl, the color match is perfect. It doesn't leave my skin looking orange. A little bit goes a long way, and the applicator is cute.The price was awesome and it arrived super early. I have many other ELF stuff, and to me, they never disappoint. I like this color corrector and will try all the others as well.Hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Color is good.

reviews.reviewText: The green e.l.f. Camo Color Corrector is the product I've been looking for! Finally! It is pigmented more than green primers I had tried in the past but not too Shrek-like (like the L.A. Girl Pro corrector).The product is a little on the thin side, but is buildable and easy to apply. I dot in on my red areas (chin, nose) and blend it in with a small flat brush (but fingers would work just fine). It is crazy how my red is neutralized instantly. My foundation looks so much better now that I am starting with a neutral-colored base. My foundation actually appears less patchy.

reviews.reviewTitle: Erfüllt genau seinen Zweck bei dunklen Augenringen
reviews.reviewText: Ich war lange auf der Suche nach einem deckenden CC-Produkt gegen meine Augenringe. Dieser concealer ist ein Game changer! In Drogerien gibt es kein vergleichbares Produkt! Ich brauche auf diesem Produkt nicht mal mehr einen hautfarbenen concealer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This product is a great value for money and it texture is very smooth meaning that it blends very easily. It gives a full coverage and is perfect to colour correct and red place(E.g spots). It is very easy to use and it’s performance is very good. It will last all day!

I have a bad case of dark circles and most concealers would leave a grey cast. Then, I saw someone using this in one of the make up tutorials in IG. I wasn’t sure if this would work, but it did! I used it with my concealer. It worked much better than the colour corrector I had before ($60). Affordable, great coverage and no more grey cast. Lovin’ it! ❤️
Did a wonderful job covering my dark circles. Very easy to blend and very light weight. Comparable to my old $30 color corrector!
